My name is Ksenya and

item.text: The [http://viral.academy Viral Academy] is a project to create a new [[Free Culture]] educational methodology based on [[Small Group Work]] and [[P2P Teaching]].

item.title: Welcome Visitors

item.text: You can wander all day in the federation, and it's easy to get sidetracked. Here we link you directly to the things you must be do/be able to do before the March Happening, in a nice linear style. You can still wander if you want, but if you want to do the minimum, go through this list, skip the byways, and you will be set.

We are starting a small number of [[Courses]], and should you be interested in [[Starting Your Own Academy]] or helping out by joining as one of our [[Teachers]] or [[Experts and Mentors]]. See more on how to [[Get Involved]] here.
The Viral Academy is an open distributed education project for offline and online group work. Our aim is to make online learning more social, personalised, and flexible.
